english.segment1: This is an invitation. To overwhelm my heart. I'm asking You to meet me. I'm waiting here to start
english.segment2: My soul is like a desert. Thirsty for Your rain. So open up the Heavens. And fill me up again. I am ready for my life to be consumed
english.segment3: Father, here I am. Overwhelm, overwhelm. Only Your love can. Overwhelm, overwhelm. Let Your spirit fall. Overtake it all. Overwhelm, overwhelm. Overwhelm, overwhelm me
english.segment4: Desperate for Your presence. I long for You alone. So dwell within me, Jesus. This temple is Your home. I am ready for this life to be consumed
